hero.title: John Doe

about.heading: About Me
about.content: I'm a passionate designer with over 5 years of experience creating digital products that users love. I specialize in UI/UX design, branding, and visual storytelling.

projects.title: E-Commerce Redesign
projects.description: Complete redesign of a modern e-commerce platform focusing on user experience and conversion optimization.

projects.title: Brand Identity
projects.description: Created a comprehensive brand identity system including logo, color palette, and typography guidelines.

projects.title: Mobile App Design
projects.description: Designed an intuitive mobile application with focus on accessibility and user engagement.
